main-section.title: Get your webpage for launch your brand to the web
main-section.text: I offer design services and webpage develop. To improve the position of your brand on the web, I use the best technologies and SEO techniques available.

process-section.title: How is the process?
process-section.text: First, we'll collect your requirements so we know what you want on the page. Second, I will create the page designs and models. As soon as you approve the design, I will begin developing the webpage. During all process you can follow the progress.

services-section.title: Services
services-section.service-text_1: I can give you everything you need to get started with your brand. Color palettes and fonts are included.
services-section.service-text_2: We design your website based in your brand's image.
services-section.service-text_3: We develop your website with the best technologies available on the market.

contact-section.title: Contact me and tell me your ideas for your website

about-page.title: About me
about-page.description: This is me! My name is Axel Sarmiento, and I am from Argentina. I am dedicated to Front-end development. My studies are based largely on self-taught through my research and another part at the hands of the Spanish OpenBootCamp academy, I have also studied Psychology at the university and Philosophy in a self-taught way. I also speak Spanish, English, and Italian.
